sense.gloss: to take down, to bring down, to lower (a hand, flag, shutter, etc.), to drop (an anchor, curtain, etc.), to let down (hair), to launch (a boat)
to drop off (a passenger), to let off, to unload (goods, a truck, etc.), to offload, to discharge
to use for the first time, to wear for the first time
to cut off, to fillet (fish), to grate (e.g. radish), to prune (branches)
to remove (someone from a position), to oust, to drop
to clear (the table), to remove (offerings from an altar), to pass down (e.g. old clothes), to hand down
to expel from the body (e.g. worms), to abort (a fetus)
to invoke (a spirit), to call down

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓らは↑錠↑↓じょう↓を↑下↑↓|お↓ろす|のを↑忘↑↓わす↓れた。
sdata.e: They forgot to lock the door.

sdata.j: ↑教会↑↓きょうかい↓は↑町↑↓まち↓を↑見下↑↓み|お↓ろす|↑丘↑↓おか↓の↑上↑↓うえ↓にある。
sdata.e: The church is on the hill overlooking the city.
Good. Now go down with it.

sdata.j: これを↑下↑↓|お↓ろす|の↑手伝↑↓てつだ↓ってください。
sdata.e: Please give me help in taking this down.

sdata.j: ↑見下↑↓み|お↓ろす|と、たくさんのビルが↑見↑↓み↓えた。
sdata.e: When we looked down, we saw many buildings.

sdata.j: ↑港↑↓みなと↓を↑見下↑↓み|お↓ろす|↑墓↑↓はか↓に↑墓碑↑↓ぼひ↓を↑立↑↓た↓てた。
sdata.e: They set up a tombstone over the grave overlooking the harbor.

sdata.j: ↑仕事↑↓しごと↓に↑行↑↓い↓くときこの↑包↑↓つつ↓みをジョーンズの↑家↑↓いえ↓で|おろす|ことにしよう。
sdata.e: I will drop off this package at the Jones' when I go to work.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑腰↑↓こし↓を|おろす|とすぐ↑寝込↑↓ねこ↓んだ。
sdata.e: As soon as I sat down, I fell asleep.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑谷間↑↓たにま↓を↑見下↑↓み|お↓ろす|↑部屋↑↓へや↓が↑好↑↓す↓きだった。
sdata.e: I liked the room overlooking the valley.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑銀行↑↓ぎんこう↓から↑貯金↑↓ちょきん↓を↑全部↑↓ぜんぶ↓|おろす|つもりだった。
sdata.e: She intended to withdraw all her savings from the bank.

sdata.j: ふと↑通↑↓とお↓りに↑目↑↓め↓をやると、↑行↑↓い↓き↑交↑↓か↓う↑人↑↓ひと↓の↑中↑↓なか↓に、↑１人↑↓ひとり↓↑立↑↓た↓ち↑止↑↓ど↓まり↑俺↑↓おれ↓を↑見下↑↓み|お↓ろす|↑者↑↓もの↓がいた。
sdata.e: As I glanced at the street there was somebody looking down at me in the middle of those walking past each other.

sdata.j: ↑軽↑↓かる↓くひと↑泳↑↓およ↓ぎした↑僕↑↓ぼく↓は、↑水↑↓みず↓から↑上↑↓あ↓がってプールサイドに↑腰↑↓こし↓を↑下↑↓|お↓ろす|。
sdata.e: After a light swim, I came up from the water and sat down on the poolside.

sdata.j: ↑俺↑↓おれ↓のとびきりのアイデアをこき↑下↑↓|お↓ろす|のはやめてくれ。↑見通↑↓みとお↓しが↑甘↑↓あま↓いとかそんなことないよ。
sdata.e: Stop slagging off my brilliant idea, it's not naive at all!

sdata.j: これを↑下↑↓|お↓ろす|の↑手伝↑↓てつだ↓ってください。
sdata.e: Please help me take this down.

sdata.j: ↑人々↑↓ひとびと↓は、↑選挙↑↓せんきょ↓を↑通↑↓とお↓った↑独裁↑↓どくさい↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓を↑引↑↓ひ↓きずり↑下↑↓|お↓ろす|ことができないなら、↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑従↑↓したが↓うしかない。
sdata.e: If the people cannot use elections to drag a dictator down from power, they'll have no choice but to obey him.

sdata.j: ↑駅↑↓えき↓のところで↑降↑↓|お↓ろす|よ。
sdata.e: I'll drop you off at the station.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑後↑↓うし↓ろに↑立↑↓た↓って、↑私↑↓わたし↓のツムジを↑見下↑↓み|お↓ろす|のは↑止↑↓や↓めてくれる？
sdata.e: Can you stop standing behind me and looking at my hair whorl?

sdata.j: これを↑降↑↓|お↓ろす|の↑手伝↑↓てつだ↓って。
